    • getOrdersByAnnouncement

      public List<PurchaseOrder> getOrdersByAnnouncement(Announcement saleAnnouncement)
      Retrieves the index of the specified SaleAnnouncement in the PurchaseOrderRepository.
      Parameters:
      saleAnnouncement - The SaleAnnouncement for which to retrieve the index.
      Returns:
      The index of the SaleAnnouncement in the PurchaseOrderRepository, or -1 if not found.
